title: 18C.433 COMMERCIAL ANIMAL WASTE APPLICATION.
text:
Beginning January 1, 2006, only a commercial animal waste technician site manager or commercial animal waste technician applicator may apply animal waste from a feedlot that:
(1) has a capacity of 300 animal units or more; and
(2) does not have an updated manure management plan that meets the requirements of Pollution Control Agency rules.
[Repealed by amendment, 2004 c 254 s 4]
[Repealed by amendment, 2004 c 254 s 4]
